REAndroid/APKEditor.Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Minor improvement on dex building performance
* Fix dex container building issues
* Fix smali parsing #198 
* Update README @yonggamer in https://github.com/REAndroid/APKEditor/pull/203


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/REAndroid/APKEditor/compare/V1.4.4...V1.4.5

inotia00/revanced-cli.Changelog:
- Based on ReVanced Cli [5.0.0](https://github.com/ReVanced/revanced-cli/tree/v5.0.0)
- Added option command `options` (`options.json` file generator)
- Added option command `patches` (`patches.json` file generator)
- Added option command `--legacy-options` (set patch option via options.json file)
- Added option command `--rip-libs` (remove native libs from apk)
- Added option command `--unsigned` (disable signing of the final apk, regardless of whether it is mounted or not)
- Added support anti-split (merged some [REAndroid/ARSCLib](https://github.com/REAndroid/ARSCLib) sources to implement anti-split)

inotia00/revanced-patches.Changelog:
YouTube
==
- feat(YouTube): Add support version `20.05.46` [ReVanced_Extended#3192](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3192)
- feat(YouTube - Enable debug logging): Add `Watch next processing delay` setting
- feat(YouTube - Keyword filter): AND and NOT-AND logic for video filtering [#157](https://github.com/inotia00/revanced-patches/pull/157)
- feat(YouTube - Player components): Add `Disable double tap chapter skip` setting
- feat(YouTube - SponsorBlock): Add `Undo automatic skip toast` [ReVanced_Extended#3223](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3223)
- feat(YouTube - Spoof streaming data): Add `TV Simply (No PoToken)` client (May not work)
- feat(YouTube - Spoof streaming data): Rename `Disable VR AV1` to `Enable VR AV1`
- fix(YouTube - Alternative thumbnails): `Callback success error` toast keeps showing [ReVanced_Extended#3184](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3184)
- fix(YouTube - Enable debug logging): Sometimes the app force closes when copying logs to the clipboard
- fix(YouTube - Player components): Hide new type of end screen card
- fix(YouTube - Settings): Use an overlay to show search results
- fix(YouTube - Spoof streaming data): Audio track menu is not shown in system language when `Disable forced auto audio track` is turned on [ReVanced_Extended#3206](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3206)
- fix(YouTube - Spoof streaming data): `Prioritize video quality` setting sometimes doesn't work on devices that don't support AV1 decoding
- fix(YouTube - Swipe controls): Swipe controls sometimes become active after chapters show in the seekbar


YouTube Music
==
- chore(YouTube Music - Settings): Add a host activity class to prepare for implementing the search bar
- feat(YouTube Music): Add `Disable forced auto audio tracks` patch
- feat(YouTube Music - Spoof app version): `6.42.55 - Disable real-time lyrics` is now available in YouTube Music 7.25.53+
- feat(YouTube Music - Spoof streaming data): Add `Use latest player JavaScript` setting [ReVanced_Extended#3197](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3197)
- feat(YouTube Music - Spoof streaming data): Add `visionOS` client, Remove `YouTube Studio` client [ReVanced_Extended#3215](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3215)
- fix(YouTube Music): Patching fails on Android 5-7 [#158](https://github.com/inotia00/revanced-patches/pull/158)
- fix(YouTube Music - Watch history): Network lag occurs when Watch history is blocked on a mobile network


Shared
==
- build: Bump dependency
- chore(ResourceMappingPatch): Use the read-only version of document constructor [#159](https://github.com/inotia00/revanced-patches/pull/159)
- feat(GmsCore support): Add `Original MicroG` option to `GmsCore vendor group ID` patch option (For LineageOS microG edition)
- feat(GmsCore support): Pass signature check of DroidGaurdResult (the.apk)
- feat(Logger): Add support for more log levels
- feat(Spoof streaming data): Add `Use yt-dlp ejs (WIP)` setting [ReVanced_Extended#3228](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3228)
- feat(Spoof streaming data): Reflects the latest changes in MediaServiceCore
- feat(Spoof streaming data): Remove `TV Simply` client, which is no longer working [yt-dlp#14456 (comment)](https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/issues/14456#issuecomment-3339355268) [ReVanced_Extended#3197](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3197)
- feat(Spoof streaming data): Remove `Use latest player JavaScript` setting [ReVanced_Extended#3197](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3197)
- feat(Spoof streaming data): Update innerTube client
- feat(Spoof streaming data): Use the `cpn` parameter in JavaScript clients, just like in NewPipe Extractor
- feat(Spoof streaming data): `t` parameter is used when fetching streaming data, just like in NewPipe Extractor
- fix(Return YouTube Dislike): Do not show error toast if API returns 401 status


Announcement
==
- **Clean install is recommended.**
- **[Announcement: Playback Issues on YouTube and YouTube Music](https://github.com/inotia00/ReVanced_Extended/issues/3181)**
- **[Troubleshooting playback issues on YouTube and YouTube Music](https://github.com/ReVanced-Extended-Community/Community-Guides/blob/main/news/playback-issues-announcement.md)**
- **There is a change in `options.json`. If you see warnings related to patch options, remove the `options.json` file or `Patch options`.**
- Compatible ReVanced Manager: [RVX Manager v1.25.5 (fork)](https://github.com/inotia00/revanced-manager/releases/tag/v1.25.5).


Contribute to translation
==
- [YouTube](https://crowdin.com/project/revancedextended)
- [YT Music](https://crowdin.com/project/revancedmusicextended)
